text: (nim'ma dana dharmavu) allahana margadalli nirbandhitaragiruva mandige sallali. (Dhana sampadanegagi) bhumiyalli odaduva samarthya avarigilla. Avara sankocada karana, ajnanigalu avarannu srimantarendu grahisuttare. Adare nivu (dutaru) avarannu avara mukhadindale gurutisaballari. Avaru janara bennu hididu bhikse beduvudilla. Nivu satkaryadalli maduva ella kharcugala kuritu, allahanu khandita aritiruttane
